item.title: 吉利旗下吉客考虑在欧洲制造电动汽车以规避关税
item.description: 电动汽车制造商Zeekr正考虑在与其母公司--中国汽车集团浙江吉利控股集团有限公司--有关联的欧洲工厂生产汽车，以规避欧盟关税并进一步扩大其国际扩张。【原文：Electric vehicle maker Zeekr is considering making cars in European factories linked to its parent, the Chinese auto conglomerate Zhejiang Geely Holding Group Co., to avoid European Union tariffs and further its international expansion.】

item.title: 力拓锂业的耐心终于在塞尔维亚得到回报
item.description:
矿业公司为开放 Jadar site 所做的三年努力蕴含着如何让政府和公民站在一起的经验教训。【原文：

Miner’s three-year effort to open its Jadar site carries lessons about getting governments and citizens onside together.

】

item.title: 加密货币交易公司 Wintermute 正与腾讯及其他投资者洽谈融资事宜
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，加密货币交易公司 Wintermute Trading Ltd. 正在与包括腾讯控股有限公司在内的投资者洽谈融资事宜，估值约为 20 亿美元。【原文：Crypto trading firm Wintermute Trading Ltd. is in talks with investors including Tencent Holdings Ltd. to raise money at a valuation of roughly $2 billion, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 西方对俄罗斯油轮的挤压越来越紧：石油战略
item.description: 彭博石油策略师朱利安-李（Julian Lee）写道，又是一周，七国集团对在全球运输俄罗斯石油的油轮船队再次施压。【原文：Another week, another gentle turning up of the heat by Group of Seven nations on the fleet of tankers moving Russian petroleum around the world, writes Bloomberg oil strategist Julian Lee.】

item.title: SLB 和哈里伯顿看到国际油田需求强劲
item.description: SLB 和哈里伯顿公司是全球最大的两家油田服务供应商，它们在公布盈利达到或超过预期后表示，国际原油钻探需求强劲，支持它们进军海外市场。【原文：SLB and Halliburton Co., two of the world’s biggest oilfield service providers, said they see strong international demand for crude drilling after posting earnings that met or exceeded expectations, supporting their shift into overseas markets.】

item.title: 罗马老板弗里德金结束收购埃弗顿足球俱乐部的竞标
item.description: 罗马俱乐部（AS Roma）老板丹-弗里德金（Dan Friedkin）在与英超埃弗顿足球俱乐部（Everton FC）就收购其多数股权进行独家谈判近一个月后，不再继续执行收购陷入财务困境的埃弗顿俱乐部的计划。【原文：AS Roma owner Dan Friedkin won’t proceed with a plan to buy financially stricken Everton FC, almost a month after entering exclusive talks to acquire a majority stake in the Premier League football club.】

item.title: 南非将提出碳市场监管建议
item.description: 南非国家财政部计划在未来几个月内就如何监管该国的碳市场提出建议。【原文：South Africa’s National Treasury plans to lay out its proposals for how to regulate carbon markets in the country in the next few months.】

item.title: 法国小麦因供应担忧而上涨，而美国小麦则长势喜人
item.description: 巴黎小麦期货周五上涨，因为主要生产国报告收成缓慢，产量减少。【原文：Paris wheat futures advanced on Friday as major producing nations reported slow harvests and dwindling production.】

item.title: 乌克兰拘留 30 名挪用军队资金的官员
item.description: 乌克兰在全国范围内拘留了 30 名涉嫌挪用国家国防专项资金的官员，因为基辅正努力向西方捐助者保证它正在妥善使用援助。【原文：Ukraine detained 30 officials nationwide over alleged embezzlement of funds earmarked for the state’s defense, as Kyiv struggles to assure Western donors that it’s properly using assistance.】

item.title: 对冲基金制定了选举计划：卖出平静，买入混乱
item.description: 这个选举交易怎么样？现在就卖出获胜股票，这样今年秋天政治角逐白热化时，您手头就有现金，可以积极买入。【原文：How’s this for an election trade? Sell your winners now so you have cash on hand this fall to do some aggressive buying as the political jockeying heats up.】

item.title: 欧盟关系开始恶化，梅洛尼可能正在失去魔力
item.description: 乔治亚-梅洛尼开始发现自己被欧洲人拒之门外。但她不会就此罢休。【原文：Giorgia Meloni is starting to find herself shut out of the European conversation. And she’s not going down without a fight.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。在微软公司报告出现故障后，银行、航空公司和交易所都受到了干扰。美联储九月降息的希望越来越大。拜登总统面临前所未有的压力，要求他退出2024年大选。以下是您需要了解的信息— Morwenna Coniam【原文：Good morning. Banks, airlines and exchanges have been disrupted after Microsoft reported an outage. Hopes are growing the Fed will cut interest rates in September. And President Biden faces unprecedented pressure to drop out of the 2024 election race. Here’s what you need to know — Morwenna Coniam】

item.title: ION 以 13.5 亿欧元完成对意大利 Prelios 公司的收购
item.description: ION 集团以 13.5 亿欧元（约合 15 亿美元）的价格完成了对意大利资产管理公司 Prelios SpA 的收购，在此之前，ION 集团与意大利当局就该交易进行了数月的反复磋商。【原文：ION Group completed the acquisition of Italian asset manager Prelios SpA for €1.35 billion ($1.5 billion), following months of back-and-forth with Italian authorities on the deal.】

item.title: 礼来减肥药在中国获批，与诺和诺德展开竞争
item.description: 在诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）的类似疗法获得中国监管部门批准后不到一个月，礼来公司（Eli Lilly & Co.【原文：Eli Lilly & Co.’s Mounjaro gained Chinese regulatory approval for weight less than a month after a similar therapy from Novo Nordisk A/S, fueling competition in a nation that’s among the world’s most severely hit by obesity.】

item.title: 塞尔维亚获得欧盟供应协议，推进锂业雄心
item.description: 塞尔维亚和欧盟签署了一项关于提供关键原材料的框架协议，因为这个巴尔干国家正寻求利用一个计划中的锂矿成为一个地区电动汽车生产中心。【原文：Serbia and the European Union signed a framework agreement on providing critical raw materials as the Balkan nation seeks to leverage a planned lithium mine to become a regional hub for electric vehicle production.】

item.title: 据说 Cinven 正在洽谈收购 Bridgepoint 旗下 Vitamin Well 公司的股份
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Cinven 正在就收购 Vitamin Well 集团股份进行深入谈判，该交易对这家瑞典健康饮料制造商的估值超过 20 亿欧元（22 亿美元）。【原文：Cinven is in advanced talks to acquire a stake in Vitamin Well Group in a deal valuing the Swedish healthy beverage maker at more than €2 billion ($2.2 billion), according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 泰国计划成立财政机构以改善服务和吸引资金
item.description: 泰国说，它将建立一个一站式综合金融服务机构，以便在吸引外国资金和投资者方面更具竞争力，并将很快起草一项法律，帮助将该国定位为地区金融中心。【原文：Thailand said it will create a one-stop agency for integrated financial services to be more competitive in attracting foreign funds and investors, and will soon draft a law that will help position the country as a regional financial hub.】

item.title: 埃及天然气产量接近六年最低水平，转为进口国
item.description: 埃及的天然气产量已降至六年多来的最低点，而此时正值炎热的夏季，对这种燃料的需求大增。【原文：Egypt’s natural gas production has dropped to the lowest in more than six years just as a scorching summer boosts demand for the fuel.】

item.title: 没有可可脂的巧克力是什么？巧克力 "又便宜
item.description:
由于原材料成本居高不下，越来越多的包装食品公司正在评估巧克力口味食品中的无可可替代品。【原文：

More packaged food companies are evaluating cocoa-free substitutes in their chocolate-flavored treats as raw material costs stay high.

】

item.title: 摩根大通部分员工在全球停电中无法登录
item.description: 据知情人士透露，由于世界各地的公司都遇到了技术问题，摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：Some JPMorgan Chase & Co. staffers were unable to log on to the firm’s systems Friday as companies around the world were hit with technical issues, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 阿布扎比马斯达尔公司在完成 10 亿美元交易后计划发行更多绿色债券
item.description: 阿布扎比主要的可再生能源公司马斯达尔（Masdar）计划在未来几年内每年出售一次绿色债券，为全球扩张提供资金。【原文：Abu Dhabi’s main renewables energy company Masdar is planning to sell green bonds annually for the next few years to help fund a global expansion.】

item.title: 印度央行行长表示，印度央行需要 "明确 "关注通货膨胀问题
item.description: 印度央行行长达斯（Shaktikanta Das）表示，由于经济增长依然强劲，印度央行需要 "毫不含糊地 "关注通货膨胀问题，这也增加了人们对利率将维持更长时间的预期。【原文：India’s central bank needs to “unambiguously” focus on inflation as economic growth remains strong, Governor Shaktikanta Das said, adding to expectations interest rates will be kept on hold for longer.】

item.title: 欧洲央行西姆库斯同意市场对 2024 年再减息两次的预测
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员格迪米纳斯-西姆库斯（Gediminas Simkus）表示，他同意投资者关于今年再降息两次的赌注。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Gediminas Simkus said he agrees with investor wagers on two more reductions in interest rates this year.】

item.title: 关于 JD Vance 和美元未来的更多信息
item.description:
美元的储备货币地位是经济负担吗？【原文：

Is the dollar's reserve currency status an economic burden?

】

item.title: 欧洲央行调查显示明年欧元区通胀率将达到 2
item.description: 欧洲中央银行对专业预测人员进行的季度调查显示，该行将在 2025 年实现通胀目标。【原文：The European Central Bank will meet its inflation target in 2025, according to its quarterly survey of professional forecasters.】

item.title: 巴克莱称中国人民币对印度越来越重要
item.description: 据巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）称，印度可能会竭尽全力确保卢比跟上人民币走软的步伐，以保护其出口竞争力。【原文：India is likely to do all it can to ensure the rupee keeps pace with the weakening Chinese yuan in order to protect its export competitiveness, according to Barclays Plc.】

item.title: 南非 Capitec 称其系统受全球故障影响
item.description: 南非最大的客户银行凯普泰克银行控股有限公司（Capitec Bank Holdings Ltd.）表示，在一系列全球性技术故障导致全球航空公司和银行服务中断之后，该公司正面临全国性的系统问题。【原文：Capitec Bank Holdings Ltd., South Africa’s biggest bank by customers, said it’s facing nationwide system issues after a series of global technical glitches disrupted services at airlines and banks around the world.】

item.title: 土耳其食客为躲避 90% 的餐馆通胀率纷纷涌向希腊
item.description: 在旅游旺季，土耳其一些度假小镇的餐馆半空中，因为许多当地人发现，到邻国希腊度假比在本国世界著名的度假胜地住宿和用餐更便宜。【原文：Restaurants in some Turkish holiday towns are sitting half-empty in peak tourist season, as many locals find it’s cheaper to holiday in neighboring Greece than stay and eat in one of their own country’s world-famous resorts.】

item.title: 欧洲股市跌幅扩大，旅游业股票受停运影响
item.description: 欧洲股市周五连续第五个交易日下跌，原因是一系列全球性技术故障打击了旅游业，不过该地区的交易正常进行。【原文：European stocks fell on Friday for a fifth straight session as a series of global technical glitches hit the travel sector, though trading in the region proceeded as normal.】

item.title: 欧洲央行维勒鲁瓦称市场对利率路径的预期合理
item.description: 欧洲央行理事会成员弗朗索瓦-维勒鲁瓦-德-加尔豪（Francois Villeroy de Galhau）表示，欧洲央行下一步关于借贷成本的决定将取决于数据，并补充说他不会对 9 月份的下一次会议做出预测。【原文：The European Central Bank’s next decisions on borrowing costs will depend on data, Governing Council member Francois Villeroy de Galhau said, adding that he wouldn’t make a prediction for the next meeting in September.】
